class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: In this course, students continue to expand their diagnostic reasoning skills while appraising health outcomes for acutely ill or injured infants, children and adolescents in specialty, inpatient and emergency department settings.
prerequisites: NRSG 815D and NRSG 816D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 1580, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: T. Motley, Status: Open
